name: Sandbox
body:
![Sandbox Homepage](http://bhupathyap.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/revozo-14.png)

# Welcome

Sandbox is an Online Treasure Hunt Organized as a part of _REVOZO'14_ .A National Level Technical Symposium Organized by 
Department of Information Technology
Kumaraguru College of Technology
Coimbatore

***

# Function
* A user can signup and login to Get Started
* they will be presented with 4 blended images  which will have a connection between them
* If they answer correctly they will be redirected to next question
* In the meanwhile they can check their progress against others competitors in LEADER BOARD.
* In Forum they can discuss and ask clues
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
